episodes.synopsis: Strawberry Shortcake is planning a party for Apple Dumpling, and she meets a lot of new friends while searching for the items she needs.
episodes.title: Meet Strawberry Shortcake

episodes.synopsis: Strawberry Shortcake wants to go shopping in Holidayland. With some help from Santa Claus, she comes up with gift ideas for everyone!
episodes.title: Berry Merry Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Spring is here, but winter isn't going away! Can Strawberry Shortcake and her friends find the problem and get the seasons back on track?
episodes.title: Spring for Strawberry Shortcake

episodes.synopsis: When Honey Pie Pony hurts her leg and has to stay in bed, it's up to Strawberry Shortcake and her friends to take care of her.
episodes.title: Get Well Adventures

video.title: Strawberry Shortcake
video.synopsis: Strawberry and her friends, including her sister, Apple Dumpling, and her pony, Honey Pie, embark on sweet-smelling adventures in Strawberryland.
